data.title: Land Records Search Website
data.meta_description: Land Records Search Website:The East Haven Town Clerk’s Office is pleased to announce the availability online of land records indexed and scanned from 01/01/1970 to 12/31/1970 and again from 12/29/1975 to present as well as all recorded maps.
data.text:
The East Haven Town Clerk’s Office is pleased to announce the availability online of land records indexed and scanned from 01/01/1970 to 12/31/1970 and again from 12/29/1975 to present as well as all recorded maps. Also available online are East Haven's Land Record Index Book Records from 1970-1976 Grantor/Grantee A-Z. While searching and viewing watermarked images is free, a $2.00 charge to print/download a document applies from outside the Town Clerk's Office. (From the Town Clerk' Office in Town Hall, the fee is $1.00 per page.)

Please follow the link to begin searching!

To access the East Haven Land Records site go to http://www.searchiqs.com/ the East Haven land records search page.

*Please Note: While the Town Clerk's Office has attempted to preserve the accuracy of this online version, these records are not official and neither the Town of East Haven nor the Town Clerk of the Town of East haven will be responsible for any inaccuracies that may be encountered when using this on-line version. Only those records and the indices that are maintained and physically located in the Town of East Haven Town Clerk's Office shall be referenced as the Official Public Records of the Town of East Haven.
